about_the_game:
Train in style with a new Shadow inspired & designed by pro Valorant player Lucas “Mendokusaii” Håkansson! Feel like a pro. Train like a pro. Become a pro.

This skins pack includes:
  • Shadow
  • 9mm

About Mendo
Valorant player, streamer and member of Team Liquid. Former CS:GO, Overwatch and Apex pro. Mendo holds the Apex Legends world record of 36 kills in one match!

About Aimlabs
  • Aimlabs learns and identifies your core strengths and weaknesses
  • Skills and tasks adapt to your play using AI to optimize your individual progression
  • See play-by-play results and targeted tips for improvement
  • Compare your FPS skills — agnostic to game title — to other players and the pros
  • Rank and compete on the Aimlabs leaderboards
  • Fully customize your training with creator tools for custom tasks

name: Aimlabs Signature Series - Mendo

subs.option_text: Aim Lab Signature Series - Mendo - $3.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 560 and up
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 560 and up
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
